about_the_game:
You are ghost hunters.

A game in which you catch ghosts and with some chance you can get the caught ghost into your Steam inventory. Collect as many ghosts as possible!

We Have

Various types of ghosts - there will be more than 50 types in the game, but you will only have to catch selected ghosts.
Falling system - with each click you increase the chance of finding the ghost you need, which you can get in your inventory!
The best market economy - we don’t flood the market with "hundreds" of items like other developers because we do NOT operate on the principles of a financial pyramid.

Invite friends

Play with friends and get a bonus for each friend you invite!

good luck and dont get rect ;)

, dyor
